steps.title: 1. Add a New Worker
steps.description: Tap the '+' icon and fill in basic worker info like full name, CIN, and job title.

steps.title: 2. Add Login Credentials
steps.description: You can assign credentials like username and password to allow worker access.

steps.title: 3. Set Working Days
steps.description: Keep track of total working days for the worker. Tap 'Update Working Days' to modify.

steps.title: 4. Manage Worker Payments
steps.description: View, add, or edit salary or advance payments for the selected worker.

steps.title: 5. Force Upload Public Data
steps.description: Push worker payment data immediately to public dashboard

steps.title: 6. View Existing Workers
steps.description: See all active personnel in your company. Tap to view or edit any worker.
